channel.title: CaribHub - The beginning of a Private Server Hub
channel.description:
[CENTER][SIZE=5]Previously "EPICURUS" We seek to create a network of private servers for every popular online game starting with RS! Check out our new RSPS based on our last as we begin this new venture, you can be our first player! Check us out today and see how much new development we have done![/SIZE] [url=http://epicurus-pk.com][IMG]http://rsps.net/images/epicu.png[/img][/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/lYbMzMs.png[/img] [size=5][b]PRESENTS[/b][/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/iqCaxDb.png[/img]
[size=4][i]May I present to you, our new expansion to this re-established community, our second PK world - [color=#FF0000][b]EPICURUS PK[/b][/color]![/i][/size]
[size=4][b]Now the challenge rises, the leaderboards are filling up, and you, our newest champion, must fight other players to conquer the land of [color=#FF0000]Epicurus PK[/color]. You must start from the bottom and battle your way through hundreds of foes to accomplish this goal. Earn glorious armour and epic weapons as you progress through your journey. Create an alliance with other players and fight together in Multi-PK zones or simply fight head to head with other players in our traditional home, here in Edgeville.[/b][/size]
[i][size=4][b]So what's stopping you? Join now and explore these amazing features![/b][/size][/i]
[img]http://s2.postimage.org/1waex5o10/9j41t1.png[/img] [url=http://forum.epicurus-pk.com]Forums[/url] [img]http://ikov.org/images/advert/download.png[/img] [url=http://www.epicurus-pk.com/Epicurus.jar]Download Client[/url] [img]http://ikov.org/images/advert/play.png[/img] [url=http://epicurus-pk.com/play]Webclient[/url][/CENTER]
[size=6][b]Current Features:[/b][/size]
[ul][*]Grand Exchange [*]Party Room for Drop Parties [*]Flawless Lottery [*]Flawless Dicing [*]Flawless Duel Arena & Staking [*]Flawless Shopping System [*]Flawless Banking & Searching [*]PK Leader-boards [*]Rank Icon Changing System [*]Flawless Loyalty Titles [*]Flawless Donator System [*]Perfect Curse System [*]Flawless Hybridding [*]Weapon Combination Staking [*]Random PvP Rewards [*]Perfect PvP Point Rewards [*]Perfect Combat System & PvP weapons [*]Custom Capes [i](To be implemented)[/i] [*]Choose to be Maxed/Pure at Login [i](Swap anytime)[/i] [*]All You Need In One Place - Edgeville [*]Vote for PK Items [*]Earn Coloured Whips for Special Effects! [*]Different PK Zones [i](Multi/Single)[/i][/ul]
[CENTER][size=5][b]Your Goal & Achieving It!
[img]http://gyazo.com/0de2bcd85b1a2c393eca293190434fb0.png[/img]

Gaining Armour & Weapons

item.title: CaribHub - The beginning of a Private Server Hub
item.dc:creator: @EpicPvP EpicPvP
item.description:
@EpicPvP wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:6, topic:550845”]There’s so much wrong with this…

You’re advertising Epicurus but running a totally different server, your website name is epicurus but it’s called something different, you don’t even have the correct links in this thread.

I checked out the server anyway but it would be nice to see the actual server advertised. What makes your server better than any other pk server out there?

tldr; good luck[/quote]
Follow our future updates and you’ll see what makes us better.

Read full topic
item.source: CaribHub - The beginning of a Private Server Hub

[CENTER][SIZE=5]Previously “EPICURUS” We seek to create a network of private servers for every popular online game starting with RS! Check out our new RSPS based on our last as we begin this new venture, you can be our first player! Check us out today and see how much new development we have done![/SIZE]


[size=5]PRESENTS[/size]

[size=4]May I present to you, our new expansion to this re-established community, our second PK world - [color=#FF0000]EPICURUS PK[/color]![/size]

[size=4]Now the challenge rises, the leaderboards are filling up, and you, our newest champion, must fight other players to conquer the land of [color=#FF0000]Epicurus PK[/color]. You must start from the bottom and battle your way through hundreds of foes to accomplish this goal. Earn glorious armour and epic weapons as you progress through your journey. Create an alliance with other players and fight together in Multi-PK zones or simply fight head to head with other players in our traditional home, here in Edgeville.[/size]
